title: Can we get InDesign for free? How? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the past before Creative Cloud, educators were able to obtain one free program for the classroom per year. I have no idea whether there is anything like that now. Other than that, Adobe always let you use a fully functional program for 30 days for free. I recommend that when someone with a one-time need. I believe that Adobe offers a one-program (monthly rate that is less than the $50/mo that allows use of the multitude.
You can get a free 30 day trial of any Adobe software. After that, you'd need to pay a monthly fee. The only alternative would an illegal version.
